php.LBL_Module_desc: Here you can define which profiles have access to all records regardless of roles.
php.LBL_VIEW_ALL_DESC: If you tick this option, all the modules will have a marked option of: Browsing
php.LBL_VIEW_ALL: فعال کردن پیش نمایش از تمام رکوردها
php.LBL_EDIT_ALL_DESC: If you tick this option, all the modules will have a marked option of: Create/Edit.
